text_block_list.text: Do you believe in what you cannot see…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
You really are fast… 
I'm going to have to train even harder…
…in what can only be seen through the eyes of another…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: To catch her… to catch my… friend…
Who are you…?

By the time I noticed I didn't have 
my phone, it was already dark.

I'd been watching the Uma Musume training that 
day… I must have left it at the track.

I rushed back, and found it by the blinking 
of the low battery light.
Heehee…
…fun… hehe… nder…… atch…

Eerie laughter broke the silence. An Uma Musume 
out training? At this time of night…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I'm okay. I can still run.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Again… and again…… as many times as it takes…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I love to run… with you…

Nobody… it was dark, but not so dark that I couldn't see there 
was no-one else there. Intrigued, I decided to approach…
(bonk!!)

It felt like someone had struck me hard in the shoulder. I looked 
around. But of course, there was no-one there.
choice_data_list: (M… Maybe I'm just a little tired…)

text_block_list.text:
An Uma Musume, talking to no-one. 
A knock to the shoulder, from nothing but thin air.

I thought for a moment that I felt a cold wind, a wind that blew 
right through me. 'My mind must be playing tricks on me,' I 
thought, and set off for home.

text_block_list.name: Scouted Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Really?! Thank you! Thank you so much!! 
It's my dream to win a GI race!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Yes! And I will do everything I can to get you 
there! Let's chase that dream… together!

text_block_list.name: Nervous Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Y… yes! I want to race in the Twinkle Series! 
More than anything in the world…!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Alright. The qualifiers are coming up soon. How 
about you show me what you're made of there?

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
Heeey <username>! How's the scouting 
going? You find any good prospects?

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that one there caught your eye, huh? 
She looks good, nice form. You gonna make her an offer?
choice_data_list: Eh… I don't know about that…

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
You sure? Wait, who is she anyway? 
Let me check my notes here, umm…

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
"Manhattan Cafe", huh. I bet she's going to get a lot of 
attention running like that. If you're not interested, maybe I'll 
go have a word with her…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Recruit… me…?

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
That's right! If you don't have a trainer yet, what do you say we 
team up? Together, we can conquer the Twinkle Series!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Twinkle… Series……

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text: I'll train you into the strongest Uma Musume there is!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
The… strongest…? 
You mean… even stronger than… her?

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
"Her"? Who do you mean? Oh, there's another Uma Musume 
you have your sights set on, is that it?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Yes…… 
She's fast, very fast…… 
She's right… there…

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
Eh? Th… there's nobody over there…? 
Is this supposed to be a joke?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
My friend…… she looks just like me… 
She brought me here… she is very special to me……

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Ever since I was a child… never changing… 
Always running… always just out of reach… 
She is the one that I pursue.

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
Well, that was a waste of time. She doesn't seem interested in 
finding a trainer. Or talking, even.

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
I don't know, she just spouted a bunch of gibberish at me. Like 
she just wanted to get rid of me. She's… I know I probably 
shouldn't say this, but…

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text: She's kinda… creepy.

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
Aaa… anyway! Probably best to steer clear of 
her if you ask me. Don't waste your time.
"Creepy"… I thought back to the previous night.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Again… and again… as many times as it takes…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I love to run… with you…

I'd told myself it was just my imagination, just my mind playing 
tricks on me. But I couldn't stop thinking about it.

But why did she not even give my trainer friend the time of day? 
Does she really not want to race?

The mystery of Manhattan Cafe swirled 
around my mind until night fell.
